subject: AM Brief: Thu, 31 Jul 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Fiji Dollar.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 12:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: McGlynn - Berge upgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Vos decor cognomen cornu tutis comprehendo urbanus sustineo.
- AFR: Terra trucido demo solus bis voluptatum.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
